title: GetMyCountryâ€‹
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client This is a yielding function. When called, it will pause the Lua thread that called the function until a result is ready to be returned, without interrupting other scripts. Yields </> CountryService:GetMyCountry() â†’Â Country? Returns your own Country. Only works when called from a client script
